name: Demon's Blood
description:
Welcome to Demon's Blood the game where you play a cultist from an irish sect with different weapons who has to get control back of the mansion where demons come in stronger and stronger waves to escape and wreak havoc on the world.

Try our tutorial to learn how to play and every single step to defeat your enemies with ease !

Play solo to test yourself, train or gain some exp to upgrade your weapons or play with a friend as a team or as rivals by comparing who survives the longest or who has the best score at the end !

We're actually in a playtests phase so we'll listen to most feedbacks to try and improve the game so come and share your thoughts to us so we can build a really good game together.
